mapper.select: select ROWNUM rn ,NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE noticeTitle, NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, NOTICE_CNT noticeCnt, EMP_NO empNo from (select *from notice order by notice_no desc )where notice_kind=1 and rownum=1

select ROWNUM, boardNo, boardTitle, boardCon, boardDate, BOARD_FILE, boardCnt, memId from( select Board_NO boardNo, board_title boardTitle,BOARD_CON boardCon, BOARD_DATE boardDate, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_CNT boardCnt, MEM_ID memId from BOARD order by board_no desc)
boardNo between #{startEndPageDTO.startRow} and #{startEndPageDTO.endRow}

select rownum, boardNo, boardTitle,boardCon, boardDate, BOARD_FILE, boardCnt, memId
from (select Board_NO boardNo, board_title boardTitle,BOARD_CON boardCon, BOARD_DATE boardDate, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_CNT boardCnt, MEM_ID memId from BOARD order by Board_NO desc )where rownum < 5

select board_NO boardNo, board_title boardTitle,board_con boardCon, board_date boardDate, board_FILE boardFile, board_Cnt boardCnt, mem_id memID ,board_org_file boardOrgFile,board_file_size boardFileSize from board where board_no= #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_Con = #{boardCon} , board_org_file =#{boardOrgFile}, board_file_size =#{boardFileSize}, board_file=#{boardFile} where board_no = #{boardNo}
